name: Transformation Elixir
description: Mysterious elixir which can shapeshift your pet. The effects seem permanent.

name: Healing Elixir
description: Restores HP equal to your pet's vitality stat.

name: Mighty Bean
description: Increases your pet's might stat by 1 permanently.

name: Speedy Bean
description: Increases your pet's swiftness stat by 1 permanently.

name: Sensey Bean
description: Increases your pet's instinct stat by 1 permanently.

name: Healthy Bean
description: Increases your pet's vitality stat by 1 permanently.

name: Smarty Bean
description: Increases your pet's smarts stat by 1 permanently.

name: Power Cell
description: Restores 10 charge to your pet's armor or shield.
